alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; South Central Highlands; South Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 5:44PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL LINCOLN, EASTERN SOCORRO AND SOUTHEASTERN TORRANCE COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM MDT... At 543 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Claunch, or 19 miles west of Corona, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corona, Gran Quivira, Claunch and Cedarvale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor your preferred media outlets and NOAA Weather Radio for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. Blowing dust associated with strong thunderstorm winds can reduce visibilities below one quarter mile at times.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; South Central Highlands; South Central Mountains
